alert.note: Alert for Love (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:28PM CDT until June 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LOVE COUNTY... At 1028 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Leon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Thackerville, Leon, Rubottom, Burneyville, and Courtney. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 2 and 13. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter, safe room, or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
